DOC.brief_summary: Multicentre Phase II trial , compare two different administration route SLITonePLUS Birch regard pharmacodynamic efficacy tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability Two Different Administration Routes With SLITonePLUS Birch
DOC.criteria: A history Birch pollen allergy Positive skin prick test birch Positive specific IgE birch Exclusion criterion : Uncontrolled severe asthma ( FEV1 < 70 % predict value spite adequate pharmacologic treatment ) Previous treatment immunotherapy birch crossreactingtree pollen allergen within previous 5 year Concomitant SLIT allergen
